description: Manage storage for an Azure Media Services account.

commands.name: az ams account storage add
commands.summary: Attach a secondary storage to an Azure Media Services account.
commands.syntax:
az ams account storage add [--account-name]
                           [--ids]
                           [--name]
                           [--resource-group]
                           [--subscription]
                           [--system-assigned {false, true}]
                           [--user-assigned]

commands.name: az ams account storage remove
commands.summary: Detach a secondary storage from an Azure Media Services account.

commands.name: az ams account storage set-authentication
commands.summary: Set the authentication of a storage account attached to an Azure Media Services account.
commands.syntax:
az ams account storage set-authentication --storage-auth {ManagedIdentity, System}
                                          [--account-name]
                                          [--ids]
                                          [--resource-group]
                                          [--storage-account-id]
                                          [--subscription]
                                          [--system-assigned {false, true}]
                                          [--user-assigned]

commands.name: az ams account storage sync-storage-keys
commands.summary: Synchronize storage account keys for a storage account associated with an Azure Media Services account.
